objects.specification: A large rectangular booth floor measuring ten meters by six meters covered in a neutral light gray matte finish. The surface has a subtle non-reflective texture to provide a safe walking surface and a minimalist look that does not distract from displayed content.

A tall enclosing back wall three meters high and ten meters wide, coated in a bright complimentary color. The surface is smooth and evenly painted for a modern look that highlights promotional materials.
A front enclosing wall three meters high and ten meters wide, painted in the same bright color to provide visual consistency and frame the booth entrance elegantly.
A left side wall three meters high and six meters deep, with a smooth painted finish in the booth’s signature bright color to create a cohesive visual boundary.
A right side wall three meters high and six meters deep, painted in the same bright color for uniformity and to support mounted graphics or lighting.

A sleek, modern demo car with a high-gloss bright red finish. It features smooth aerodynamic lines, polished metal accents, and tinted windows to attract attention and emphasize the brand’s premium image.
A large vertical fabric banner with a smooth matte finish, displaying high-resolution car brand logos and promotional graphics in vibrant colors to draw visitor attention.
A matching vertical fabric banner with the same premium finish, showcasing the brand’s signature graphics and ensuring visual balance on the right side wall.

A modern rectangular reception desk with a glossy white lacquered finish and subtly rounded corners. It has integrated shelving on the inner side and a minimalist design that complements the booth aesthetic.
An ergonomic reception chair with a padded seat and backrest upholstered in dark gray fabric, featuring a chrome frame and caster wheels for easy adjustment.
A small round visitor table with a matte charcoal metal frame and a smooth medium-tone wooden tabletop, sized for two-person discussions.
An ergonomic visitor chair with a dark gray padded seat and back, supported by a sleek metal frame for comfortable seating during discussions.
An ergonomic visitor chair with a dark gray padded seat and back, supported by a sleek metal frame for comfortable seating during discussions.
A small round visitor table with a matte charcoal metal frame and a smooth medium-tone wooden tabletop, sized for two-person discussions.
An ergonomic visitor chair with a dark gray padded seat and back, supported by a sleek metal frame for comfortable seating during discussions.
An ergonomic visitor chair with a dark gray padded seat and back, supported by a sleek metal frame for comfortable seating during discussions.
A cylindrical overhead spotlight with a white housing, suspended from the ceiling. It casts a focused beam of bright white light directly onto the demo car.
A cylindrical overhead spotlight with a white housing, suspended from the ceiling. It casts a focused beam of bright white light directly onto the demo car.
A medium-sized potted plant with lush green leaves, placed in a modern gray planter. It adds a fresh touch of greenery near the reception area.
A medium-sized potted plant with lush green leaves, placed in a modern gray planter. It brings a natural accent to the visitor seating area.
A medium-sized potted plant with lush green leaves, placed in a modern gray planter. It brings a natural accent to the visitor seating area.
